puja sithin pirinamana danayehi aanisansa mahathpalaya mahanishansa ya.buddha pramukha maha sangharathnayata piliganwu dana mahathpala mahanisansa gena dena bawa bauddhayo danithi.mahasangharathnaya udesa danpirinamimen mahathpala urumakaragath wishakha situdewiya, anepindusituthuma, mallikadewiya, kosala rajathuma, bimbisara rajathuma yanadi dhanadhanyayen aadya wu piris gana bududahamehi noaduwa sandahan weyi.thama thamanta haki ayurin nathi baripudgalayin udesa pirinamana danayanda sulukota nosalake.
